data.title: Alexandra Orlando on LinkedIn: Splunk Accredited Observability Sales Rep I was issued by Splunk to…
data.meta_description: View my verified achievement from Splunk.
data.text:
Gabriela Parker this was powerful - let's see how far we can get this to reach. Jorge Camacho is more than just a seasoned expert in the tech industry — he's the embodiment of professionalism & heart. When I started at Splunk, he was one of those people who ensured you felt comfortable and I knew he had my back with the millions of questions I had. Thanks Jorge Camacho for being there for me. Can't wait to see who gets lucky enough to hire you! #Observability #SolutionsArchitect #PerformanceEngineer #Bilingual #TechIndustry #JobSeeker #Networking #OpenTelemetry #SalesEngineer #NewOpportunities #Observability #SolutionsEngineering #TechTalent #ITOperations #SystemsEngineering, #InfrastructureAsCode #ApplicationPerformanceManagement #TechRecruiting #EngineeringExcellence #TechJobs #CloudSolutions #SRE

1) A new prospect decides to move to Okta after a detailed and comprehensive technical win that solves existing and future Identity goals. Nearly as important, is the full C-Suite alignment. 2) Deployed via Professional Services/or via one or our approved partners with a concrete realistic time line for roll out stages. 3) Full account team engagement before/during/after roll out. Full accountability. No excuses. 4) Impeccable internal handover to Renewals 6-12 months from current subscription end date. Renewals then take over and this is where the team showcase not just commercial and relationship acumen, they treat people like human beings and respect is the key word. We take this very seriously at Okta and anyone who knows me understands I live and breathe renewals. It is not a job for me, it is a passion. WE do not settle for anything other than a world class renewals experience for all our customers and my team will go above and beyond to exceed expectations. Our No1 goal is to have happy and successful customers who WANT to renew as they see that Okta is transparent, ethical and clear in all communications while leading the way from a technological standpoint. This process starts from the first sales contact until renewal and after. We will never accept anything less.

As a new fiscal year unfolds for Okta reps, we understand the challenges that come with territory reshuffles and the pursuit of ambitious quotas. That's where Kilterset steps in! We're excited to offer NO COST presales support exclusively to Okta reps. With nearly a decade of expertise in Auth0 solution building, we're not just a support team; we're an extension of your sales force. Our proudest achievement? The Ikon Pass CIC-centric software solution for Alterra Mountain Company – a testament to our robust and successful approach. Rely on Kilterset for: 1) Technical Presales Guidance, Design Thinking, and CIC Sales Enablement 2) Requirements Gathering & Scoping 3) Expertise in RFP/SOW/Proposal Writing & Management (Attention: SLED/Federal Reps!) 4) Overcoming misc. barriers to entry/bottlenecks (Tell us what you need!) Bringing those hard-to-close deals across the finish line Together, let's exceed those bold sales targets and maximize your new territory! #OktaSales #PresalesSupport #Kilterset #Auth0Experts #CIC #PartnersInSuccess
